Throws: if the constant could not be resolved.
readResolve().Description: Resolves instances being deserialized to the predefined constants.

NumberFormat.Field(java.lang.String).Description: Creates a Field instance with the specified name.

ClassDesc: Defines constants that are used as attribute keys in the AttributedCharacterIterator returned from NumberFormat.formatToCharacterIterator and as field identifiers in FieldPosition.
